replies.body:
mfw i post in a spicy boards thread 

https://78.media.tumblr.com/c9274b3f1dcc851c808f3107865201b6/tumblr_inline_nz2jviW7Vg1tea6pw_500.gif
Well maybe next time don't accuse OP of "spreading misinformation" when you assume they meant something else.

it's funny because I know what you're talking about, and he actually went back and edited his comment. His original comment linked his previous statements on Orange essence and asked where the OP got the information from. The OP never said anything, because he didn't have any information/didn't base his point on any information he actually had.

I understand rioter hate is a meta on these boards, but give cactopus a break. At least he tries to respond seriously. The Rioter comments from the Varus lore change were kinda just there to troll us harder.
I didn't say I hate Cactopus, I'm glad he responds. But he misunderstood OP on what he meant completely.

I get what you mean, but I really feel like I got burnt for no reason in that thread about orange essence. OP was making it impossible to have a fair discussion with the inaccurate/incomplete quote and the weird comments about skin shards from leveling/chests. Like, if we have to come in and spend five minutes setting the record straight before we even have a conversation, it's tempting to just ignore the thread altogether. In this case I decided to just take the bullet and address the issues while also linking to a full response about orange essence. But still got dunked on with downvotes. That's life I guess.

Now here I am being a salty boi when I should be posting memes in this thread 

https://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2Fimgur.com%2F3bxba8ns.gif&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=150

Hey dude, I've been reading your comments in the board for the last 30 minutes and your passion and love for your job and League brought tears to my eyes.
I swear to god I've been hating this game for so long now after the assassins rework but damn if I know I love something that's people like you and you deserve all the good stuff in this world!(no homo)
I still hate this game but now I am your fanboy.
You are fucking awesome and keep up the good work! I fucking love you so much(still no homo)!
Also sorry for posting here(whatever you are doing, I dont know..) I just wanted you to get the positive vibes asap ç_ç

Lol shit dude don't play the game if you hate it! 

Or even if you do hate it just play with me and we'll turn it around. I like to do super tilting builds on ARAM like full crit Nunu. You're guaranteed to have a good time when somebody is playing full crit Nunu.

> You're guaranteed to have a good time when somebody is playing full crit Nunu.

At least if Nunu is on the enemy team.
Someone's guaranteed to have a good time when somebody is playing full crit Nunu.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Cactopus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zjJJdR4c,comment-id=0005000200000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-12-06T05:53:57.046+0000)
>
> Lol shit dude don't play the game if you hate it! 
> 
> Or even if you do hate it just play with me and we'll turn it around. I like to do super tilting builds on ARAM like full crit Nunu. You're guaranteed to have a good time when somebody is playing full crit Nunu.

ADC {{champion:9}} is a fun one to. You probably won't win but it's a blast regardless.

Goddamn, I had to leave the house and I couldn't reply to this sooner!
But yeh I love ARAMs, if you we can play togheter I'm gonna make a NA account right now just to watch you play it lol. Also if you think crit Nunu is dope you yet have to see my brand new Zoe adc.
Kinda random, but I love your name. Reminds me of stuff like Bravest Warriors or Puppycat and Bee
IDK what a puppycat is but it sounds adorable AF
https://www.dailydot.com/wp-content/uploads/fcb/2d/e0bf75ae2c9a38ce067f25b5258ed9f3.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Cactopus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zjJJdR4c,comment-id=0005000200000000000000010000,timestamp=2017-12-06T05:58:14.511+0000)
>
> IDK what a puppycat is but it sounds adorable AF

Taria seems to be talking about this duo [right here](http://nerdist.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Hero-Pose-1.png). Puppycat's the angry looking cat (but you probably already guessed that).

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Cactopus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zjJJdR4c,comment-id=00050002000000000000,timestamp=2017-12-06T05:27:35.349+0000)
>
> I get what you mean, but I really feel like I got burnt for no reason in that thread about orange essence. OP was making it impossible to have a fair discussion with the inaccurate/incomplete quote and the weird comments about skin shards from leveling/chests. Like, if we have to come in and spend five minutes setting the record straight before we even have a conversation, it's tempting to just ignore the thread altogether. In this case I decided to just take the bullet and address the issues while also linking to a full response about orange essence. But still got dunked on with downvotes. That's life I guess.
> 
> Now here I am being a salty boi when I should be posting memes in this thread 
> 
> https://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2Fimgur.com%2F3bxba8ns.gif&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=150

But there is no denying that riot did a terrible job of informing players of the OE nerfs before they were going to happen. The info was incredibly ambiguous.

We really did do our best. Aside from all the engagement we did on the boards/other communities about it we published it in three separate places in the lead-up to preseason: in the original announcement article, in the preseason FAQ, and as a message in the client for two whole weeks. 

That being said, I don't wanna just dismiss your feedback. Maybe we do have a bigger problem where we really just can't reach all the right people even if we put stuff in the client. In that case in the future we might wanna think about doing things like sending out automated emails to people who'll be affected. It's worth thinking about on our end, because we do wanna give fair warning to people when we make big changes.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Cactopus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zjJJdR4c,comment-id=0005000200000000000000020000,timestamp=2017-12-06T05:57:48.434+0000)
>
> We really did do our best. Aside from all the engagement we did on the boards/other communities about it we published it in three separate places in the lead-up to preseason: in the original announcement article, in the preseason FAQ, and as a message in the client for two whole weeks. 
> 
> That being said, I don't wanna just dismiss your feedback. Maybe we do have a bigger problem where we really just can't reach all the right people even if we put stuff in the client. In that case in the future we might wanna think about doing things like sending out automated emails to people who'll be affected. It's worth thinking about on our end, because we do wanna give fair warning to people when we make big changes.

I think some one posted awhile ago that there was only like one or two lines containing the words orange essence in your news article about the nerfs. And I'm not saying you didn't inform us, it was just really unclear.

I don't want this to sound passive-aggressive, but I don't know how else to word it, I'm just curious: Why couldn't Riot have refunded everyone with OE equal to the amount that their in-inventory shards lost from the change. Was is just not technically feasible to give everyone that refund (like not enough time to do it during patch maintenance, and not enough detailed logs to do it afterwards)?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Cactopus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zjJJdR4c,comment-id=0005000200000000000000020000,timestamp=2017-12-06T05:57:48.434+0000)
>
> We really did do our best. Aside from all the engagement we did on the boards/other communities about it we published it in three separate places in the lead-up to preseason: in the original announcement article, in the preseason FAQ, and as a message in the client for two whole weeks. 
> 
> That being said, I don't wanna just dismiss your feedback. Maybe we do have a bigger problem where we really just can't reach all the right people even if we put stuff in the client. In that case in the future we might wanna think about doing things like sending out automated emails to people who'll be affected. It's worth thinking about on our end, because we do wanna give fair warning to people when we make big changes.


I still feel like the OE nerf wasnt "really" announced i can be wrong here, but i think the announcement in the client was only talking about champion shards (may be wrong here)
On another Note, what really triggers me is that (IMO) such an important announcement (you get less free stuff, lets face it, thats how it is), didnt got announced seperately. I flew over the Preseason FAQ when it was released an i atleast feel like it could have its own Headline and not get completely hidden between the lines:
https://puu.sh/yAtIE/ae2df76a0b.png
Right now im sitting on a shitload of skinshards and i have honestly no idea what to do with them coz disenchanting just feels so incredible bad and rerolling is really meh since i like most of the skins i have there x)

Exactly. There is no denying Riot tried to hide the Orange Essence nerfs. If they had really wanted to communicate it properly, they would have at least written _Orange Essence_ instead of _disenchant values from all kinds of shards [...] including skin shards_. Back when that post was published, I tried searching the page (Ctrl-F) for Orange Essence and I was amazed how it wasn't mentioned even once. Luckily, I did see and interpret the crucial parts referring to Orange Essence, so I disenchanted in time.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Cactopus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zjJJdR4c,comment-id=0005000200000000000000020000,timestamp=2017-12-06T05:57:48.434+0000)
>
> We really did do our best. Aside from all the engagement we did on the boards/other communities about it we published it in three separate places in the lead-up to preseason: in the original announcement article, in the preseason FAQ, and as a message in the client for two whole weeks. 

In the interest of fairness, I've gone back and looked at the available announcements that you wrote about the preseason changes.

[Nexus article](https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/en-us/2017/09/upcoming-changes-to-leveling-ip-rewards/)
[Preseason FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012640908-Preseason-Update-FAQ))

Unfortunately, there wasn't a mention of "Orange Essence" specifically, just a mention of tuning down drop rates for disenchanting all shards.  To quote you (an entire paragraph that you quoted in another board post):

>Since you’ll be getting so many more shards thanks to the new leveling system (and with other recent changes to honor and events), **we’ll tune down the relative value of the essence you get from disenchanting shards of all types—champ shards, skin shards, and ward skin shards**.... To offset the disenchant rate changes, we’re going to change the way loot chests work so you’ll have a chance to get two drops in each chest. Get ready for chests inside of your chests. We’ll also add “bad luck protection,” so you won’t ever go on long streaks without getting a skin shard or a gemstone from chests.

In fact, I believe the first messages about Orange Essence specifically came from you a few days later in [this post](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/fRZopjhE-bring-back-the-old-value-of-orange-disenchant-riot?comment=0009)

If there's another post from you specifically mentioning OE earlier than this, either on the boards or on Reddit, I couldn't find it.

I hope this helps.  I do believe you tried your best to get the message out.  (Hell, I lost my internet during most of the year and I was able to hear about the Preseason changes.  However, I do believe that you weren't 100% clear about the actual nerfs to OE (purely unintentional, I'm sure).

> That being said, I don't wanna just dismiss your feedback. Maybe we do have a bigger problem where we really just can't reach all the right people even if we put stuff in the client. In that case in the future we might wanna think about doing things like sending out automated emails to people who'll be affected. It's worth thinking about on our end, because **we do wanna give fair warning to people when we make big changes.**

Varus not withstanding?  ;)

> We really did do our best. [...] we published it in three separate places

Cactopus, you know I regularly take Riot's side on these boards, but yes, the info WAS ambiguous. In all 3 places you mention, it was never clear and emphasized that this ALSO included orange shards, and someone who was just reading it quickly could very easily get the impression it was only talking about champion shards, since everything else around those posts was only talking about champion shard.

And I know, I know, the info you gave was *right*, but my point is, it wasn't *clear*. Sometimes just being right isn't enough.

Personally, I was really skeptical about that in-client notification.

I thought rito were were putting that message there to try to milk more money off people afterwards, as I didn't see CLEARLY written how OEs would be changed (from a numeric stand point)

Eitherway, where ever you go, it seems like you'll get hate.

http://ak8.picdn.net/shutterstock/videos/5277428/thumb/10.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Cactopus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zjJJdR4c,comment-id=0005000200000000000000020000,timestamp=2017-12-06T05:57:48.434+0000)
>
> We really did do our best. Aside from all the engagement we did on the boards/other communities about it we published it in three separate places in the lead-up to preseason: in the original announcement article, in the preseason FAQ, and as a message in the client for two whole weeks. 
> 
> That being said, I don't wanna just dismiss your feedback. Maybe we do have a bigger problem where we really just can't reach all the right people even if we put stuff in the client. In that case in the future we might wanna think about doing things like sending out automated emails to people who'll be affected. It's worth thinking about on our end, because we do wanna give fair warning to people when we make big changes.

dude ive been reading your comments all day and i gotta say i can honestly see that you at least like your job i can definitely tell when you get to the point that you are aggravated with stupid people that dont know how to sit down and have a logical conversation about  _______. i honestly wish that there was a way for riot members to just be able to sit and have a convo with players sometimes outside of boards. that way you could just kick the people that arent willing to be civil and get everyone elses honest opinions. i would love to be able to do that. if there are please send me a link and  ill drop by sometime .... im tired of this salty hole we call boards.

I somehow missed OE nerf announcement, because I only thought BE was getting changed and such. When I saw notifications in League that I should disenchant/reroll champion shards, butI did not this for Skin shards. I feel like OE changes should've had as much visibility as BE changes did, e.g. The Preseason video and more.

I dunno about that, I got a in-client notification of changes in BE coming and to disenchant stuff.

Glad I did follow that.

Maybe people just forgot about small reminders like those.

> [{quoted}](name=Kei143,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zjJJdR4c,comment-id=0005000200000000000000020001,timestamp=2017-12-06T21:26:49.919+0000)
>
> I dunno about that, I got a in-client notification of changes in BE coming and to disenchant stuff.
> 
> Glad I did follow that.
> 
> Maybe people just forgot about small reminders like those.

Exactly BE... none were about OE

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Cactopus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zjJJdR4c,comment-id=00050002000000000000,timestamp=2017-12-06T05:27:35.349+0000)

> https://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2Fimgur.com%2F3bxba8ns.gif&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=150


Hey you stole my meme!
https://pics.me.me/youve-been-visited-by-meme-police-no-ticket-today-but-10166367.png

We appreciate you guys. I know not everybody does, but I mean, the other game I play a lot comes from EA. EA, guys. Stop pretending Riot is EA. They're not. Most Riot employees are transparent and kind and good-intentioned, and they are just trying to give us answers and try to be good liaisons between the company and the consumer. I honestly really respect Riot, and their employees. I think you guys are doing a good job! :)
I did present a more sound argument instead. I get you receive a lot of messages so i'm saying this now: It's still up there with no reply.
Im sure everyone will like you if you come thru and revert Fizz tbh :]

> I really feel like I got burnt for no reason 

That's just kinda how it works here.  If you are a rioter commenting on a post that is painting riot as "the bad guy" then you'll get downvoted regardless of your information's accuracy.

I think it is really awesome that you take the time to respond to player concerns. Its always awesome when Rioters get on to explain and clarify.

I would like to make one comment tho. I understand that Riot has to be profitable and I love that they give me a chance to earn skins without paying. But the changes to Orange essence and not being able to combine champ shards to get a permanent feels really bad. Since the Preseason changes it feels way harder to get skin shards. It feels harder to get chests, and almost every chest I have opened contained a champ shard. As a player who already has every champion it feels irritating to get a champ shard which provides no real value to me. I guess what I am trying to say it that the system felt better and more rewarding before these changes.

I mean it doesn't feel awesome only earning 50 Blue Essence for a first win and then nothing else until I Level up and  have to harvest BE from whatever skin shards I randomly got. It would feel much more natural to get a little XP and BE every match. But I understand that it is more directed to new players that are working towards acquiring champions. So I can overlook how tedious that part of the system feels.

And at the end of the day the way a game "Feels" is very important.

I feel you. Some people don't care if you can talk to them or not. You be you, you're no salty boi. You're the Cactopus, and you're the Rioter of the Boards. Now go out there, and post your memes. Disagree with people. And I'm sorry if I sounded like a rude boi <3

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Cactopus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zjJJdR4c,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-12-06T02:20:13.003+0000)

> mfw i post in a spicy boards thread

at least you were willing to try. lol

Well If you didn't misinterpret the OP of that thread and then ironically accuse him of disinformation, based on your misinterpretation, there wouldn't be backlash. Just sayin'. Like 10+ people explained what OP meant to you. And you still didn't get it. Someone's bad reading comprehension isn't "Boards'" fault.
This is actually pretty accurate.
"Time to see what nuclear meltdown we caused today."
But aren’t...you that one guy who was downdooted for such vitrol in that OE thread?
https://media.makeameme.org/created/tells-you-well.jpg
*Also gave out free new system that cost them money to make and made them lose a source of income due to it being free now*
_Then ended with populating the market with detrimental rewards (like emotes) so that money that is lost ultimately amounts to nothing_
Exactly... you get it now?
http://i.imgur.com/3bxba8n.gif
The saying "you reap what you sow" comes to mind.
Yep. Pretty typical for anything when a lot of regulators are thrown into the equation. Well said. :-)
